title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.2 - Form of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.2 - Form of application

State Regulations

Application must be made by written petition which shall be
addressed to the Water Power and Control Commission, Albany, N. Y., and shall
be signed in the name of the board of supervisors by an officer acting by
authority of such board and shall be verified by such
officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
604.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
